Package suncertify.application

Interface Summary
Configuration Interface that models the application configuration.
 

Class Summary
BaseWindow Base class for the main windows of the room reservation system.
ConfigurationController The controller in the Model-View-Controller architecture for the configuration of the application.
ConfigurationDialog Modal dialog window to display the application's configuration values.
Room Class representing a hotel room.
RoomReservationSystem The Hotel Room Reservation System for URLyBird, Inc., discount hotel room broker company.
StatusBar A GUI window Status Bar.
URLyBirdConfiguration Contains configuration information of the application.
 

Enum Summary
ExecutionMode The execution modes of the application.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationException Thrown when an error occurs configuring the application.
